item.title: Server help
item.dc:creator: @AsianTony4 AsianTony4
item.description:
@AsianTony4 wrote:

How do i remove wild on diffrent areas. Like the whole varrock map and falador map is in the wild zone.

And also how do i fix my ipban i been asking this question alot but everyones answer hasnt resolved it. this is what i have as my command for ipban

[code]if (command.startsWith(“ipban”)
&& (playerRights >= 3 || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“The Ra”) || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“Skillerzmine”) || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“Soz r4nged”) || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“The Ra”))) {
String victim = command.substring(6);
int index = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(victim);
client v = (client) server.playerHandler.players[index];

        appendToBannedIps(v.connectedFrom);
        v.disconnected = true;
        sendMessage("player successfully ip banned");
        PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerName
                + ": HAS IP BANNED THE PLAYER: " + command.substring(5);
        BufferedWriter bw = null;



        try {
            bw = new BufferedWriter(
                    new FileWriter("logs/ipbanlogs.txt", true));
            bw.write(playerName + " banned" + victim);
            bw.newLine();
            bw.flush();
        } catch (IOException ioe) {
            ioe.printStackTrace();
        } finally {
            if (bw != null) {
                try {
                    bw.close();
                } catch (IOException ioe2) {
                    sendMessage("Error logging ip bans!");
            
                }
            }
        }
    }[/code]

Read full topic
